summary: Ever wanted to marry Carlotta? Now you can!
descriptionHtml:
Although it makes no sense to be able to marry her because of her dialogue but it seems that a lot of people want to be able to marry her.  This mod puts her in the \"PotentialMarriage\" faction. You\'ll probably have to do her quest before you can marry her.

How to install:
Extract the .zip folder using your favourite program, 7zip, winrar etc.
Drag and drop the .esp into Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
Start Steam, start Skyrim and then go into \"Data Files\" and tick the box next to the .esp.
PLAY!
author: Shotgun188
